评论概述: Not as hefty as the Gilden Tee Shirts
评论详情: Even though this is classified as work shirt I say its just another tee shirt. I have been buying the Gilden shirts for years and wanted to compare. Gilden does have a lot of "models" but even their cheapest ranks better than these. That being said, even on sale, these are more expensive. I would not buy these again. Nothing wrong with them but they don't meet up to the Gilden's in any way from fit to comfort. I work in construction and wear tee shirts daily so i want a shirt that can go through the wash time after time. Obviously, its a preference thing but i don't recommend these. I really never hear much comment on Gilden but I say it is the best value out there from sweatshirts to jogging pants. Not that this is a great brand name but sometimes you pay a little more and get a little less when you go with a household name in clothing. Check out the Gilden shirts here and give it a shot. I am sure you will feel the same way I do.

评论概述: Perfect Oversized Sleep Shirts—Soft, Durable, and Comfortable!
评论详情: As a size 14-16 woman, I bought these tees in a 4X for oversized sleep shirts, and they’re absolutely perfect. They’re soft, comfortable, and have held up well even with frequent washing. The color stays vibrant, and they’ve quickly become my go-to for lounging and sleeping.  If you’re looking for an affordable, durable option for oversized shirts, these are a fantastic choice. I highly recommend them for anyone who loves a comfy, relaxed fit!
Well made. Fit well. After several washings, still hold shape well.

These Hanes Men's Workwear Short Sleeve Tees are great! The fabric feels soft and comfortable, making them perfect for long workdays. I also love that they’re wrinkle-resistant, so they stay looking neat throughout the day. The pocket is a nice touch, with enough space to keep a pen or pencil securely in place. I’m definitely planning to get more in different colors for work. Highly recommend for anyone looking for durable, comfy, and low-maintenance work shirts!
Ordered for my boyfriend for work. He likes that they’re actually hi-vis and they didn’t shrink at all in the wash. I would say they’re true to size also. Will definitely be ordering more.

The picture accompanying the product description clearly shows 3 SHIRTS.  You only get 2 SHIRTS in the order. The description does clearly state you only get 2 shirts in the order. Since arguably most people shop the images and don't read the fine print,  I find this deceptive. That being said, I have purchased these shirts twice and am very happy with the product. The seam around the neck band can be a bit scratchy/annoying. The weight of the fabric is great, heavy enough to not be clingy yet light enough to stay cool. I will buy them again but wish they'd fix the deceptive photo.

this product is for TWO shirts, not four. The listing image shows four. Read the title of the product.  I thought I was getting 4 shirts because it showed that many in the photo. The listing title states "2 pack"

评论概述: Nice shirts - be aware that this is a two pack, not three, as it's pictured.
评论详情: Nice, soft, light shirt. The description lists this as a two pack, and it is. I spaced and thought this was a three pack because of the picture. It's still a good price for the shirt. I like the pocket with the pencil seam. Be aware that this is quite thin material. If you're female and don't want to show off your bra, you will want to wear an undershirt or skin toned bra, at least with the safety green color. It does a have a neck tag, rather than print on the shirt itself. The tag didn't bother me, but I have only worn it with an undershirt.
Great price nice and comfortable, fits just right,

Bought these before and really like the shirts. Evidently at some point tho they changed from a 3 pack to a 2 pack. The picture shows a 3 pack so I just hit buy now. After going back the description says 2 pack. Amazing how they changed the description but not the picture or price! So for the 2 pack change I’m leaving a 2 star review.

I’m a landscaper in Florida and I like these shirts. For me, they’re the right weight. Not too light or heavy. Some people have complained about quality, maybe I’m lucky, but they’re holding up well. I like the poly/cotton blend. 100 percent cotton become soaked messes and 100 percent poly makes me stink to high heaven. They do retain dirt stains after washing, especially around the neck. But every brand of work shirt I’ve worn does the same. Besides, if you work in landscaping or construction and you’re bothered by this, you should probably find a new line of work. I ordered two more.
Nice shirts I love wearing them because they have a pocket.

These shirts are coming un-sewn after probably 5 washes. The sleeve will probably depart the rest of the shirt the next laundry cycle. I have other brown shirts from Dickies that are over three years old but I couldn’t find them anywhere. I highly recommend you pass on these shirts

I love the length of these shirts, they are mid thigh on me and I'm 5'-11"! They are very comfortable and keep me cool in the sun. The safety green color is a close match to my other PPE and should help others easily see me in most any situation. An added bonus, they have a pocket too!

评论概述: Not a fan seams are letting go after 3 washes
评论详情: Bought these due to the name. But i feel the quality of Hanes has went WAY DOWNHILL. Fit was okay a little tight but okay. The addition of the pencil sleeve is nice next to the pocket. Wore these for work, after the 3rd wash was when the problems started. The shirts seams around the arms let go, they are double stitched but one of the seams have totally came out. My biggest fear is that after another couple of washes I will have sleeveless work out shirts. I would not suggest buying these unless you do not mind buying more after about a month, but that's just my personal opinion.
Love these pocket Tee's. They shrink a little bit but that was expected.
